name: DEAR
description: AI-powered health and wellness transformation platform

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: DEAR needs camera access to analyze your transformation photos and sports performance videos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: DEAR needs photo library access to save and manage your transformation photos.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: DEAR needs microphone access for video recording and voice notes.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: DEAR uses location to find nearby healthcare providers and fitness facilities.
